title: At second wedding to Justin Bieber, Hailey Baldwin didn't settle for one look – she had 3
text:
CLOSE Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin celebrated their nuptials with a wedding. Stars like Kendall Jenner and Justine Skye were in attendance. USA TODAY

Looks like Hailey Baldwin said yes to the dress not once, not twice, but three times!

The model, who tied the knot (again) to pop sensation Justin Bieber Sept. 30 in South Carolina, went all out for the occasion, rocking three designer dresses made just for her, wardrobe stylist Maeve Reilly shared on Instagram Friday.

Though Mrs. Bieber posted one of her bridal looks from the ceremony on her Instagram Oct. 7, Riley revealed the 22-year-old also donned two additional high-end dresses for the accompanying festivities.

In one of Reilly's posts, Baldwin joyfully raises her arms in a custom Ralph & Russo gown, and in another, she lets out a laugh in a custom Vera Wang dress paired with white sneakers.

More: Justin Bieber shares first photos of 'my bride' Hailey Baldwin from South Carolina wedding

"The happiest bride I ever did see," Reilly captioned the latter image. "Thank you @verawanggang for @haileybieber custom dress she danced the night away in. And yes duh- sneakers"

More: Hailey Bieber shares stunning wedding dress photos from 'the most special day of my life'

One week after the special ceremony, Baldwin shared details from the big day on Instagram, including pics of her custom Off-White wedding dress designed by Virgil Abloh.

"Thank you for making my vision come to life and creating my dream dress," she wrote to Abloh, the founder of Off-White and artistic director for Louis Vuitton's men's wear collection. "I’m forever grateful I got to wear your beautiful creation."

The off-the-shoulder, lace gown featured a sweetheart neckline and long sleeves, a mermaid skirt and long train. She paired her one-of-a-kind wedding dress with an embroidered veil that had "TILL DEATH DO US PART" stitched in Abloh's signature block lettering at the end.
